listing.listing_description: _ Please note that this home is subject to fluctuating rates. For an accurate quote, please contact a Villa Specialist. _Located just off Baldy Mountain Road, perched above Breckenridge’s historic Main Street, this ultra-luxurious ski villa is ready to host your next exciting Luxury Retreat in beautiful Colorado. Whether you’re in town to ski or enjoy the summer, the many resorts and vibrant mountain villages of Colorado are packed with plenty of exciting attractions. Within five miles, you’ll have ski access to BreckConnect Gondola and Quicksilver Super 6. Travel a little further, and you’ll hit Copper Mountain Ski Resort.Lofty Fox’s living room features an extra-high coffered wood ceiling over top of the gorgeous two-sided stone fireplace, which sits opposite the massive, mountain-view framing windows. Upon arrival, you’ll instantly feel the warmth and luxury of this rustic-chic ski lodge. Plush leather sofas, stately wooden accents and furniture, and top of the line electronics are found throughout the spacious interior, ensuring guests feel the villas traditional roots, as well as enjoy state of the art amenities. In the kitchen, your inner chef will be inspired by the restaurant caliber appliances, wood cabinetry, and granite countertops. When it’s time for bed, Lofty Fox has a wide range of luxurious accommodations for up to eighteen guests.After a long day on the slopes, you can return home to a heated garage, a mud room for any wet gear, and a rejuvenating hot tub on the balcony. Once you’re ready to continue your evening, decide whether you’ll be dining in the formal dining area, with space for ten, or if you’d rather an alfresco meal on the balcony. After dinner, you’ll have television, Wi-Fi, a sound system, and a DVD player to help enjoy a relaxing evening with the family.If you feel like a night out, Breckenridge’s Main Street is lined with delicious restaurants, boutique shops, and plenty of exciting nightlife establishments. If you’re traveling in the summer months, Breckenridge Golf Club is a beautifully scenic and challenging course, a must-play for any golf aficionado.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Experience contemporary California living at Trousdale Resort. This vacation rental makes it easy to live like a local in Los Angeles, with West Coast cool interiors, sun-splashed outdoor living areas and a location just minutes from the best of Beverly Hills. It’s a stylish destination for a holiday with family or a city getaway with friends.Take in panoramic views of L.A. from a private backyard with a swimming pool, hot tub, and a terrace with an outdoor living room, al-fresco shower and barbecue. After sunset, you can watch the lights come on along the skyline or enjoy the villa’s satellite TV, wet bar, gas fireplace and Wi-Fi. There’s also an exercise room so you can keep up with your routine.The villa’s 7,000 square feet of space are a dramatic study in modern style, with striking architecture and luxury furnishings. The central open-concept great room features a living area, dining area and fully equipped Bulthaup kitchen framed by stone floors and walnut ceilings. The room ends in a glass wall that can be slid back to open the space to the terrace.Trousdale Resort has one master bedroom with a king bed, terrace and direct access to the pool, and three bedrooms with queen beds. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and the same luxe touches as the rest of this contemporary oasis.From the villa’s tucked-away location in the coveted Trousdale neighborhood, it’s less than a 5-mile drive to shopping on Rodeo Drive, entertainment at The Grove, hikes in Runyon Canyon Park and the collection at the Los Angeles County Museum of Art. Bring the kids for a day out at Universal Studios or a nearby beach, or relive your honeymoon with a grown-ups-only evening in one of Hollywood’s restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Mountain scenery meets modern art at The Lion Vail - 2 Bedroom Residence. Part of The Lion, Vail Valley's newest luxury community, this stunning vacation rental offers both a sleek contemporary ambience and a location just minutes from some of Colorado's best skiing. The two bedrooms are the perfect size for two couples on holiday together, a small family or even a honeymoon-style escape to the Rockies.Guests of The Lion are welcome to use the community's shared indoor pool, indoor and outdoor hot tubs, gym, steam room, games room, business center and children's room. If you'd prefer, you can also leave gear in the villa's private ski lockers and spend evenings relaxing by the fireplace and TV or, on warmer nights, watching the stars come out from the furnished balcony.The residence is laid out around a central open-concept great room, whose high ceilings and large windows frame views of the mountains. Mid-century-influenced pieces, like a sculptural lounge chair and Tulip dining table, lend mod style to the living and dining areas. In the fully equipped kitchen, walnut cabinets and granite countertops make an equally chic statement.The 2 Bedroom Residence has one master bedroom with a king bed and fireplace, and one bedroom that can be arranged with a king bed or two double beds. Both bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Skiers will appreciate that The Lion is less than a 5-minute walk from two ski lifts and Lionshead Village, and a 5-minute drive from Vail Ski Resort. If you'll be visiting in the warmer months, you'll find Vail Golf Club and the Betty Ford Alpine Gardens. Find shopping, dining and entertainment year-round in Vail Village, a 5-minute drive from the villa.Business License Number: 003670Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Like stones in a riverbed, pavers lead the way past hedges and trees to the front door of this mid-century ranch home close to Austin’s must-sees. The L-shaped layout creates space for an open-concept great room and wraps around tucked-away outdoor living areas including a pool. Bring your swimsuit on the 2-minute drive to Zilker Metropolitan Park for a dip in its 3-acre Barton Springs Pool. Savor the Texas sunshine on a row of loungers in the private backyard, then cool off in a pool and hot tub hidden behind stands of bamboo. Sip cocktails or local craft brews in the Tulum chairs before sitting down to a meal from the barbecue at the alfresco dining table for 10. A streaming cable TV and Wi-Fi make evening entertainment a snap. The heart of this vacation rental is an open-concept great room with a sitting area, dining table for 8, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. The sitting area is all mid-century glam, from its tufted blue sofas and leather poufs to its metallic accent table and walnut armchairs. The same deep blue is echoed in the kitchen cabinetry. This luxury property has 1 master bedroom with a king bed and ensuite bathroom, 1 bedroom with a queen bed and ensuite bath, and 1 bedroom with a queen bed and access to a hall bathroom. Like the great room, the bedrooms take their style cues from mid-century classics, such as tufted benches and Sputnik chandeliers. A holiday at this villa puts you a 2-minute drive from Zilker Park, an urban oasis that stretches over more than 350 acres. Bring the family for a canoe trip on Lady Bird Lake, take a honeymoon from the everyday with a swim in Barton Springs Pool, and, if you’re in town, stop by for the annual Austin City Limits music festival. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Designed to make guests feel like they’re on the slopes, Sun Ridge Lodge offers incredible mountain views in a luxury ambience. Not only that, this Steamboat Springs vacation rental is just a few miles from Steamboat Ski Resort and the Thunderhead lift. Spacious indoor and outdoor living areas, ski storage and five bedrooms have plenty of room for up to fourteen friends and family members to relax and enjoy each other’s company.After a day on the slopes, leave your gear in the ski lockers and enjoy a little friendly competition around the ping-pong table, video-game console or pool table. Serve refreshments from the wet bar or wine fridge to sip around the fireplace and flat-screen television. In warmer weather, linger outside on a large deck with a barbecue, sitting and dining areas, a hot tub, an outdoor fireplace, heat lamps and panoramic mountain views.Sun Ridge Lodge has a classic Colorado mountain-cabin feel, but that doesn’t mean you have to sacrifice luxury. The villa’s exposed wooden beams and oversized windows frame breathtaking sunset views, as does the glass elevator. A double-height stone chimney and soft leather sofas are the perfect spot to cozy up after a day out in the snow, and an open-plan sitting area, dining room and kitchen have room for everyone to gather. The kitchen is fully equipped and has professional-grade appliances and a convenient separate breakfast bar.The villa has three bedrooms with private en-suite bathrooms: two with king beds and inviting jetted tubs, and one with a queen bed. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two bunk beds, and share a bathroom, making them perfect for parents traveling with children or a group of cousins.Though Steamboat Springs is known for some of the best powder in the country, you’ll find plenty to do no matter what time of year you visit. Spend your holiday on the slopes of Steamboat Ski Resort, less than 2 miles from Sun Ridge Lodge, or book a tee time at Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course to drive and putt amid incredible scenery. Don’t miss the town’s namesake hot springs, from the family-friendly slides at Old Town to the honeymoon-worthy natural rock pools at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ski-in, ski-out gondola access pairs with sophisticated lodge style at Sunshine Mountain. Part of the exclusive One Steamboat Place resort, this Steamboat Springs vacation rental is just minutes from some of the best skiing in Colorado. The three bedrooms in this luxury private residence can accommodate up to eight guests, and the resort’s first-class amenities make for a memorable family vacation or holiday with friends.Guests of Sunshine Mountain are welcome to use the shared pools, hot tubs, fitness center and games room at One Steamboat Place. There’s also a wine cellar, tasting room and spa for grown-ups, and a children’s center for younger visitors. If you’ll be entertaining during your stay, the villa has its own deck with a barbecue and lounge furniture, as well as an inviting media room.The rich colors, natural textures and luxe finishes found throughout One Steamboat Place are in abundance inside Sunshine Mountain. Tones of apple red and chocolate brown lend a welcoming appeal to the villa’s open-plan great room, and the gas fireplace is a warm focal point for the sectional and leather armchairs. There’s seating for ten in rustic ladder-back chairs around the dining table, and even more room at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.Sunshine Mountain has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms and one bedroom with two double beds and a shared bathroom. The media room has a sofa bed and en-suite bathroom, so larger parties can easily use the space as a fourth bedroom.While the nearest lift is just a minute away from the villa—and easily reached on skis—the resort also provides a seasonal shuttle service for guests. Don’t miss a visit to the area’s namesake hot springs, whether you take the kids to Steamboat Springs Old Town to play in the pools or your sweetheart to Strawberry Park for some honeymoon-worthy stargazing amid the natural rock formations. For summer visitors, the Rollingstone Ranch golf course is known for its fast greens and is less than 2 miles from the resort.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Business License ID: 017900Make yourself at home in Telluride in the welcoming Town Jewel. As its name suggests, this charming vacation rental is in the heart of town, within walking distance of restaurants, shops and the gondola station. Its four bedrooms can accommodate the whole family on a ski holiday or a group of eight friends on a Colorado getaway.After a day out in the mountains, prepare dinner on the barbecue. A media room and wet bar make it easy to entertain, while the gas fireplace and Wi-Fi invite you to relax a little.Town Jewel is laid out around a two-level great room with an open-concept sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen. A sleek gas fireplace is a cozy focal point in the sitting area, and a dining table that seats eight is the perfect place to enjoy the warmth of each other’s company. The media room and wet bar are separate, so the kids can watch one movie while the grown-ups enjoy another.This luxury property has a master suite with a king bed and honeymoon-suite-inspired features such as a jetted tub and private balcony, as well as one bedroom with a queen bed. The other two bedrooms each have a double bunk bed, and all four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.For skiing, make the 2-minute walk to the Telluride gondola station; for après-ski dining, shopping and more, make the 4-minute walk into the town of Telluride. If you’ll be visiting during the summer, plan to tee off in the shadow of the mountains at the nearby Telluride Golf Course or plan an afternoon at the Alta Lakes, where you can snap a few photos of the landscape and visit the ghost town.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Situated high in the hills of the historic and eclectic Mesa neighborhood, On The Rocks represents an original 1959 Hugh Kaptur AIA design often noted as one of the finest examples of modern hillside architecture in Palm Springs. Have your vacation, your way in the epitome of Palm Springs architecture, carefully reimagined to foster an exclusive resort experience reserved only for the most discerning guests. The glory of California’s Desert Cities await!Have a splash in the pristine saltwaters of the infinity swimming pool with built-in hot tub. The grounds are rounded out with an alfresco dining set, a barbeque and a fire pit. The pool deck is spacious and includes plenty of sun loungers. The interiors of On the Rocks feature a bar and a sound system. Who is the consummate entertainer in your entourage?Having undergone a multi-year renovation, On The Rocks has been reimagined by noted architect Jim Schmidt. The home’s original character remains intact, while introducing the use of raw industrial steel, clean architectural lines and ultra modern finishes. Featuring 200-degree views of three mountain ranges, the cityscape of Palm Springs and the valley floor, On The Rocks boasts a most unique and stunning vantage point. The interior furnishings, art pieces and decorations are both majestic and cool. The fully equipped kitchen includes a large center island breakfast bar.Three exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the bedrooms include king beds, en-suite bathrooms and televisions. The first master suite features an out of this world alfresco shower and a private terrace with outdoor furniture. Each suite displays a unique style and vision to keep things from getting too predictable.During your stay at On the Rocks, you will be just a few minutes by car from both the Mesquite Golf and Country Club as well as the Bel Air Greens. You will also be within walking distance of the lush Morten Botanical Garden. A little further away you will find Old Town La Quinta with its lovely boutiques and historical sites. Book now with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Palm Springs City ID: 3943

listing.listing_description: Stay in a mid-century icon at Villa Sierra. With its streamlined architecture, glam interiors and mountain views, this Desert Cities vacation rental is the quintessential Palm Springs residence. Its four bedrooms and 5,300 square feet of space can welcome groups of up to eight in vintage-inspired luxury.This California-cool ranch home opens to equally stylish outdoor living areas with a 75-foot pool, hot tub, wet bar, barbecue, and lounging and dining areas. On cooler desert nights, gather around one of the three firepits and watch the shapes of the mountains turn to silhouettes, or settle in around the wet bar and pool table in the chic indoor lounge and games room. (Keep an eye out for a limited-edition Clairtone stereo that’s the same model Sonny and Cher had in their Palm Springs home.)Relaxing amid the villa’s collection of vintage and global furnishings is like stretching out in a magazine spread. Two lounge areas, including one with a wet bar, invite you to mix cocktails and settle in for a chat. The fabulous pistachio-green, fully equipped kitchen has a smoked-glass breakfast table, and there’s a separate formal dining room that seats eight friends or family in playful pink chairs.Villa Sierra has one master bedroom with a king bed and three bedrooms with queen beds; all four have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms exude a decadent mid-century-meets-Hollywood Regency vibe—think slipper chairs, chandeliers and mirrored panels.Spend your holiday soaking in the sun by the pool or exploring the area. The villa is just a 5-minute drive from downtown Palm Springs, where you can take architectural tours by day and sit down to honeymoon-worthy dinners by night. For avid golfers, there are two courses nearby; for non-players, there’s the inspiring Moorten Botanical Garden and the Palm Springs Art Museum.Palm Springs City ID: 4037Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Just steps from Park City’s Historic Main Street, Mountain Getaway has a prime location for enjoying all that this iconic mountain town has to offer. Within seven minutes drive, you’ll have access to Park City and Deer Valley Resort bases, as well as several other ski access points. You’ll also find Park Silly Sunday Market, golf, skating, and hiking nearby. And, Salt Lake City is less than an hour’s drive from Mountain Escape.Mountain Escape’s open concept great room is the perfect place to gather as a group, get a fire going, and recount tales of everyone’s exciting day skiing. Plush designer furniture, featuring more than enough space for everyone, is positioned around the flat screen television and wood burning stone fireplace. In the kitchen, dining area, and lounge you’ll find decor leaning more towards a modern-contemporary vibe, as well as high-end electronics and state of the art appliances.Fresh mountain air and soaring mountain views are easy to find on the lavishly outfitted two-story terrace. Perfect for an alfresco dinner, Mountain Escape’s terrace features a barbecue and smoker. And, the fire pit is great for whipping up some s’mores and marshmallows for dessert. Another essential feature of the terrace is the hot tub; you’ll love it after a long day on the mountain. Back inside, Mountain Escape’s fully equipped kitchen features a dishwasher, breakfast bar, and there’s formal dining with space for eight. And, tech features include Wi-Fi, a streaming TV, and a Sonos sound system.While you’re in Park City, you’ll have numerous options for dinner, drinks, and nightlife on Historic Main Street. In the mornings, head into town for breakfast before you hit the slopes at one of Main Street’s many independent cafes. Try out the newest ski gear in the boutique shops. For the craft beer aficionados, Wasatch Brew Pub has plenty of award-winning creations to sample. And, if you feel like dancing or watching live music, check the monthly listings at the Egyptian Theatre and Park City Live, both feature a diverse range of entertainment.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Construction Note: Please note that there is construction near to this villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.Slopeside Manor is the definition of mountain luxury and a destination unto its own. This magnificent custom six bedroom, six and a half bath residence was built by one of Breckenridge’s premier luxury homebuilder. As you enter this seven thousand square foot masterpiece, you are warmly greeted by an entry that overlooks the great room. With five king bedrooms, a spacious bunkroom and four outdoor living areas, this captivating estate was designed for special gatherings and pure alpine bliss.Care to enjoy some bowling? You and your guests can do so at One Ski Hill Place. Take a dip in the pool and swim off the stress of the day to day. Slopeslide Manor features endless amenities including a full wet bar, game room and fireplace, as well as pool, ping pong table and shuffleboard tables and gaming tables. The media room is equipped with a nine foot screen, surround sound, ten reclining leather chairs and a wet bar area with extra seating for five. The kids have a space all their own in the large bunk room that features bean bag chairs and a flat screen television with an Xbox. Step outside to relish the outdoor living area with a fire pit and a private hot tub for nine.The gourmet kitchen features a double-stack oven, two dishwashers, built-in refrigerator and a Thermador stove. Fine dining is guaranteed with seating for five at the large curved granite island complimented by a beautiful dining area that seats ten. Let us know, and the staff will pre-stock the villa or set up activities and excursions for you and your guests.With a total of six exquisite bedrooms Slopeside Manor can accommodate up to twenty-two guests. Each bedroom includes king or twin sized bunk beds, an en-suite bathroom with shower and a television. Get the rest and relaxation your body deserves at your very own mountain chalet.Slopeside Manor is only a jaunt from the town of Breckenridge where you can enjoy resplendent galleries, decadent restaurants and a great nightlife. Family reunions or groups of friends, Slopeside Manor will provide anything and everything you need for a memorable alpine holiday! With all sorts of activities including skiing, snowboarding, snowshoeing, hiking, and many more, Colorado mountain adventures are endless year round!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Pull up a high-backed stool and have a cocktail at the vintage bar in this mid-century modern home in Palm Springs. Rather enjoy the moonlit desert sky, move the party out to the pool house and gather on the L-shaped sofa. In the morning, head out early for a round of golf at one of way too many PGA-caliber courses, and experience the challenge and beauty of desert golf.Designed in 1950 by Herbert Burns, one of the founding fathers of the desert modern movement, this villa is like a living museum to fans of the style. In 2018, Modern Palms had a slight revitalization, adding new furniture, artwork, and tech features to the charming, Old Hollywood atmosphere. Outside, lush desert greenery, palm trees, and a cascading water feature create the perfect environment for reading in the shade, as well as late-night pool parties. The fully-equipped kitchen is another great spot to hang out, and if you need to slip away from the group, there’s an office space for private affairs.If Modern Palms interior decor has inspired you, pay a visit to Palm Springs Art Museum and check out the rich history of the desert art scene. After, head to downtown Palm Springs for lunch at a local cafe, bakery, or patio restaurant. If you’re a fan of vintage clothes shopping, you’re going to love the desert cities. When you need a break from the hustle and bustle, take a stroll through Moorten Botanical Gardens to relax and unwind.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.City of Palm Springs ID #237

listing.listing_description: Great golf, great views and great company: it's easy to make it all part of a California holiday at Villa Lago. Set on the edge of the lake in the exclusive community at the PGA West Stadium Course, this Desert Cities vacation rental looks out over the lush fairways to the rugged mountains beyond. Nearly 5,000 square feet of living space and four bedrooms mean you can host up to eight friends on a golf getaway or extended family for a sunny stay.When you're not teeing off, relax in resort-worthy outdoor living areas that feature an infinity pool, hot tub, lounging and dining spaces, a barbecue and even an al-fresco TV. After a day on the golf course, serve drinks from the wet bar and wine cooler, and unwind by the Sonos sound system, cable TV and Wi-Fi.Nearly wall-to-wall panels of slide-away glass frame the mountain vistas for your enjoyment from an expansive open-plan great room with sitting and dining areas, a breakfast table and a breakfast bar in a fully equipped kitchen. A stacked-stone fireplace and linen-hued fabrics lend the space a serene, natural ambience, while in the kitchen, stainless steel appliances bring state-of-the-art efficiency.Villa Lago has two bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a jetted tub, gas fireplace and terrace access, and two bedrooms with queen beds. All four bedrooms at this luxury property have private en-suite bathrooms.Though its lakeside setting feels tranquil, when it comes to activities and attractions, the villa is in the heart of the action. It's a 10-minute drive or less from golf at the Stadium Course at PGA West and Motorcoach Country Club, the grounds of the Coachella festival, and shopping and dining at charming Old Town La Quinta. And if you need to fit in a few more rounds, there are several other golf courses within a 25-mile radius.License # 765943Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Step into a California dream at In the Hills. Set in the heart of Beverly Hills, only a few miles from iconic attractions like Rodeo Drive, Universal Studios and the Hollywood Bowl, this luxury vacation rental puts all of greater Los Angeles within your reach. Of course, open-plan contemporary architecture and resort-worthy outdoor living areas make it tempting to stay in and entertain family or friends.In the Hills opens to a private terrace with a pool, hot tub, sitting and dining areas, and a firepit, all tucked behind mature landscaping. Spend the day enjoying the sun from a lounger by the pool, and the evening listening to a favorite album on the villa’s sound system, watching the Apple TV or sipping a glass of California wine by the indoor gas fireplace.An open floor plan is perfect for entertaining or simply enjoying the sunshine that floods the interiors. Bays of windows and sleek tile floors in the living and dining room are an understated backdrop for daring modern furnishings such as black leather armchairs, white tuxedo sofas and elegant metal-legged dining chairs around a weighty table. The fully equipped kitchen has its own sitting area, breakfast bar and stylish accents from stainless steel appliances to beautifully patterned stone countertops.The villa’s four bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, are ideal for groups of friends or couples on holiday together. Relive your honeymoon in the master suite, which has a king bed, dual en-suite bathrooms with a jetted tub, a lounge area with a fireplace, and its own balcony, or enjoy a living area and balcony access from a second bedroom with a king bed. The other two bedrooms have queen beds.From In the Hills, it’s less than 10 miles to shopping on Rodeo Drive and The Grove, the thrills of Universal Studios, concerts at the Hollywood Bowl and the incredible collection and architecture at the Getty Center. Within 15 miles, you’ll find golf, great hiking trails in Topanga State Park and a choice of beaches where you can surf or stroll the pier.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Registration number: HSR19-002199

listing.listing_description: Reserve a stay in a brand-new luxury villa at one of Colorado's best-known ski areas at The Lion Vail - 3 Bedroom Residence. This thoughtfully designed, freshly built vacation rental is part of an exclusive community just minutes from Lionshead Village, two ski lifts and Vail Ski Resort. Its three bedrooms offer plenty of space for a group of up to six friends or a family.Guests of The Lion are welcome at the community's shared indoor pool, indoor and outdoor hot tubs, gym, steam room, games room and children's room. The villa also has its own private ski locker, fireplace, TV and Wi-Fi for cozy après-ski evenings, plus a furnished balcony for warmer nights.Luxe finishes like hardwood floors, marble and granite surfaces, and walnut cabinets distinguish the interiors of the 3 Bedroom Residence. High ceilings and oversized windows frame the mountain views, and the open-plan great room marries living and dining areas in a fully equipped kitchen-complete with breakfast bar-in one generous space.The 3 Bedroom Residence features a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a king bed and fireplace. The second bedroom has two queen beds, and the third bedroom can be arranged with two queen beds or two twin beds as needed. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Start each morning of your holiday by making the 2-minute walk to Lionshead Village, the 3-minute walk to an express chairlift or gondola, or the 5-minute drive to Vail Ski Resort. If you're planning a trip during warmer weather, you'll find plenty to do year-round in Vail Valley, from the fairways of Vail Golf Club and flora of the Betty Ford Alpine Gardens to shopping and dining in Vail Village.Business License Number: 003670Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Yeehaw! Pack those cowboy boots and Stetsons and head out to the range where wide-open spaces and a rambling ranch and bunk house sit at the end of a dusty trail. Just 25 minutes from downtown Austin, this is a mix of faux rugged, ranch chic, and 8 wild acres of Texas charm. A bunkhouse serves a mess of people as does the main ranch house where it reflects a designer’s take of hired hand and cowboy lifestyle. Leave the corporate world behind and immerse in the ranch life fantasy.Grit and Grace Ranch sprawls with room for significant events. The heated pool, water slide, waterfall, and hot tub make swimming and soaking seem like it’s in a natural rock gorge somewhere between Amarillo and Austin after a long cattle drive. Hike the trails, bird watching, or saddle up the mountain bike to discover the rugged beauty here.Evenings around the firepit with good bourbon and good friends, you might hear coyotes yip. It’s a time for long tales, relaxing, and noticing how the stars seem brighter. Where the urge to listen to a harmonica play a simple cowboy song mysteriously overtakes you.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take in snow-capped peaks, ski slopes and forest from the perfectly named Goldenview Estate. From its perch in the Baldy Mountain area, this expansive Colorado vacation rental offers incredible views—plus a location close to some of the best skiing in Breckenridge. Even better, its five bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to twenty friends on a ski holiday or an extended family celebrating a birthday or anniversary.In warmer weather, entertain outdoors on a two-level private deck with a barbecue, firepit and saltwater hot tub. When it’s cooler outside, stay indoors around the cable TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi and wet bar, read by the fireplace or put on a movie in the media room. For your comfort, the villa also has heating, air conditioning and laundry facilities.This luxury residence shows off its Colorado roots in its log beams and stone accents. Its 5,000 square feet of living space are centered on the open-plan great room, which has sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances and a breakfast bar. Oversized windows flood the room with light and frame views of the Tenmile Range.There are four bedrooms in the main house at Goldenview Estate: two with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and one with a king bed and one with two double bunk beds that share a bathroom. The fifth bedroom is a guest suite with a queen bed, en-suite bathroom, kitchenette and fireplace, perfect for in-laws wanting quiet or a couple seeking honeymoon-style privacy. It also has a loft with an additional queen mattress.The estate is less than a 10-minute drive from the heart of Breckenridge: the town’s National Historic District, shopping and dining along Main Street, and sledding and tubing in Carter Park. If you’ve come for the area’s skiing, it’s less than a 5-mile drive to both the Skyway Skiway ski run and the BreckConnect gondola.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Plot out your run on the mountains of Deer Valley from the hot tub at this contemporary ski lodge. Like the calm before the storm, embrace the scenic relaxation before the 2-minute journey to the Silver Lake Ski Lifts. After an exciting day on the slopes, return home to warm up by the fireplace. Or, head to Main Street for dinner at Riverhorse, an upscale American restaurant and wine bar.Swap out the rustic-vibes for something a little more current in Little belle's open concept living room. Sink into plush sofas while you relax by the fire and check out the big game on cable. Behind you, the chandelier-lit formal dining area and fully-equipped kitchen share one sizeable social setting. After dinner, set the kids up with a movie in the media room before retiring for the evening.In the warmer months, fill the terrace with friends and grab something fresh from the Sunday Market to grill up on the barbecue. Unleash your inner mixologist and whip up some summery cocktails or stop into the local brewery for some craft beers. The sound system should help set the tone. And, the videogame console will surely keep the kids busy.Within 7-miles, you'll be able to access skiing at Deer Valley, Park City Mountian, and Canyons Village. If there's a golfer in the group, Park City Golf Course offers a challenging set of fairways and scenic mountain landscapes. The shops and restaurants on Historic Mian Street are buzzing no matter what the season. And, there's even more shopping, dining, and nightlife 34-miles away in Salt Lake City.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sonoma County Transient Occupancy Tax Certificate #1653N.This extraordinary villa in the Napa and Sonoma region enjoys a secluded location within four miles of Sonoma Plaza. Nestled on 1.7 acres of beautifully landscaped estate with expansive views of the hills, the four-bedroom home is designed in the style of a modern Italian villa, with cypress trees flanking its outdoor pool, terracotta tile floors, and luminous pastel finishes. With a three-bedroom main house and large guesthouse, this vacation rental welcomes families and groups of friends seeking a unique yet quintessential experience of California Wine Country.Lovers of the open air will feel at home at Villa Casterno. An ample pool and half-moon-shaped spa invite you to soothing dips under the sun and stars, while sun loungers await you beneath the pergola. There is a charming bocce court for afternoon fun, while the expansive terrace welcomes alfresco barbeque meals and nighttime wine tastings around the fire pit.The 3,000-square-foot main house features three bedrooms upstairs and ample living spaces on the ground floor. Tall French doors infuse the living room with natural light and country breezes, while the fireplace keeps it toasty on cool evenings. A beautiful, peach-toned dining room seats eight beneath an astrolabe chandelier. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and ample prep space, and easily serves the dining room and alfresco patio. Heating, air conditioning, and a Sonos sound system allow you to customize your atmosphere, and there is a lovely office for quiet work or study.The master suite boasts a king bed, lounge area with fireplace, private balcony with gorgeous views, and ensuite bathroom with a marble steam shower and tub. Both of the guestrooms have queen beds and share a bathroom between them, and one opens to a balcony as well. The spacious, stand-alone guesthouse includes a studio-style apartment with queen bed, TV lounge, kitchenette, and private balcony, accompanied by a media room with sleeper sofa.Villa Casterno complements your privacy with outstanding proximity to the treasures of Sonoma wine country. You're minutes from Glen Ellen and Bouverie Wildflower Preserve, and just over four miles from Sonoma Plaza and the Overlook Trail. World-class wineries, restaurants, and tasting rooms abound in this area, and Sonoma Golf Club is close by as well.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the coveted Water House West building, this luxury property is located just steps from Main Street and the Quicksilver Lift at the base of Peak 9 in Breckenridge. Spanning 1,047 square feet over one level, this Colorado property also boasts a private balcony with expansive views ranging from Peak 1 through Peak 10. Watch the skiers and boarders glide by while taking in the breathtaking views of the mountain and Maggie Pond.During your stay at Water House on Main 6310 you will be able to enjoy an on-site exercise room, swimming pool, hot tubs and movie theater. Five star services include ski valet, ski storage and concierge. This vacation rental includes an ice maker, cable television, DVD player and complimentary Wi-Fi. Water House is right next to the Main Street Station plaza which offers sterling shopping and dining options. With Peak 9 just steps from your front door and Main Street at your back, Water House offers the perfect balance of luxury and location.The main open plan space with kitchen, living and dining areas is both convenient and stylish. The comfortable living area is positioned around a television and stone fireplace, and the dining area is contemporary with a wooden table and red leather chairs. The spacious kitchen features stainless steel appliances, a center island breakfast bar and a gas range.Two exquisite bedrooms and some additional bedding accommodate up to six guests at 6310. Each bedroom has a flat screen television and ample closet space. In addition to the king bed in the master suite, the second bedroom has two twin beds, which can also convert to a California king. There is also an additional queen sleeper sofa in the living room.Leave the rental car and shuttle buses behind! This condo puts you in the perfect location for skiing, snowboarding, mountain biking, golf and hiking. Water House on Main is ideal for entertaining family and friends. Enjoy the height of luxury “where the mountains meet Main Street.” Come for a splendid holiday or speak to our concierge about hosting a celebration such as a wedding or anniversary. In a setting where cowboy hats and ski boots are likely companions, live it up in the West!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Add a little luxury to your ski vacation with a stay at Silver Strike - 3 Bedroom + Den. This stylish three-bedroom Utah vacation rental near Park City couldn’t be more convenient, with ski-in ski-out access to the slopes at Deer Valley and a chairlift at your doorstep. But its well-appointed living spaces, state-of-the-art features and cozy layout make the property a private retreat, perfect for a family looking to escape to the mountains or a honeymoon for true powder enthusiasts.Your stay at Silver Strike - 3 Bedroom + Den includes access to the shared amenities at Silver Strike Lodge, from ski equipment lockers and a fitness center to a huge free-form outdoor hot tub. The villa has its own underground parking space, and, above ground, spectacular views of the mountains and a terrace and balcony from which to enjoy them.Textures of stone, wood and fur give the interiors of Silver Strike - 3 Bedroom + Den all the welcoming appeal of classic mountain lodges, while modern prints lend a fresh, contemporary vibe. In the great room, the rustic look of an imposing stone fireplace, exposed wood beams and antler chandeliers are balanced by large windows with mountain views, sleek chrome-legged lounge chairs and clean-lined tuxedo-style sofas. A vibrant red rug and bold ikat-print drapes meld traditional patterns and up-to-date style in the formal dining area, which seats eight. And in the fully equipped kitchen, you’ll find a practical breakfast bar and top-of-the-line appliances.Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom. The master suite features five-star amenities like a king bed, jetted tub, fireplace and balcony, and the other two bedrooms have inviting queen beds. For families traveling with kids or larger groups of friends, there are two additional bunk beds available.Silver Strike - 3 Bedroom + Den gives you direct access to the slopes at Deer Valley Resort, via the Silver Strike Express Chairlift that’s practically at the villa’s door. For apres-ski shopping, dining and entertainment, visit downtown Park City, about 3 miles away; for more jaw-dropping Western scenery or a rafting adventure, head to Brown’s Canyon, 15 miles away. Stop off for an afternoon or take an extra day or two in downtown Salt Lake City, 35 miles away, on your way to and from Salt Lake City International Airport, 39 miles from the villa.Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Angular architecture, soaring ceilings, and modern décor complete this contemporary villa. Located in the sought-after Melrose Village-West Hollywood neighborhood, expansive glass walls fully open from the rear of the house, leading to the refreshing tiled pool and two-sided fire pit. A short drive gets you to The Grove, one of the most coveted areas for high-end shopping and upscale dining. Offering over 4,700 square feet of living space, each room seamlessly flows into the next, creating an attractive open-concept presentation. Dove grey hues, stone accents, and a minimalist aesthetic decorate the interior. Verdant foliage surrounds the property, establishing a feeling of total privacy. Curl up on the plush couches, turn on the fireplace, and a play a favourite flick in the villa’s comfy living room. A curved, floating wooden staircase winds upstairs to the sumptuous bedrooms. Parasol-shielded sun loungers sit on a grassy patch that connects the main dwelling with the guest house.Pack a picnic and head out for a day trip to the historic Malibu Pier, or opt for sandy shores and surf-ready waves at Venice Beach. The iconic Santa Monica Pier, with its instantly recognizable amusement park, is within driving distance at the end of the legendary Route 66. Endless hiking trails await at Runyon Canyon Park, heart-pounding cinematic thrills can be found at Universal Studios, and the hunt for luxury goods begins on Rodeo Drive.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sunsets glow over neighboring fields and wash over the double-infinity pool at this glass-walled Amagansett retreat. The warm light floods interiors clad in cedar, white oak, and teak cabinetry, bringing natural beauty into sleek spaces designed by award-winning architect Andrew Pollock. Walk to Amagansett Village, where seafood spots sit next to designer pop-ups, and drive 2 miles to the beach.This vacation rental sits on 1.4 private acres lined with mature trees and opening to a lush field—a quiet setting for you to lounge by a swimming pool with a double infinity edge, toss local seafood on the barbecue, and uncork N.Y. wines at the al-fresco dining table. Inside, you’ll find a cable TV, Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi.Glass walls divide the villa’s wooded setting from the wood-paneled interiors. Cedar walls line the L-shaped living room, fully equipped kitchen, and dining room, while wide-plank white-oak floors stretch out underfoot. The kitchen’s custom teak cabinets are topped with subtly textured Pietra Cardosa stone. Catch up on reading in the Eames lounger in the separate den.This luxury property has five bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: one master with a king bed, two with queen beds, one with a double bed, and one with two twin beds. The other two bedrooms have double beds and share access to a hall bathroom. Together, the bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to 14 friends or family members on a Hamptons holiday.Walk from the villa to downtown Amagansett for a summer treat from a designer boutique or a honeymoon-worthy dinner of fresh seafood. It’s a 2-mile drive from the house to lifeguard-protected Atlantic Avenue Beach, where you can rent umbrellas, chairs, and beach toys, and grab clam rolls, salads, snacks, and more from the Beach Hut.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Drift along the lazy river and soak up the sun in Scottsdale at this incredible resort-like home. The envy of the neighborhood, this exciting estate will keep you busy with its one-of-a-kind lagoon pool and several sports activities. Later, gather around the fire pit or take a dip in the hot tub. After warming up on the putting green, play a round at one of many golf clubs in the area. Decorated with palm trees, alfresco lounge space, and sporting areas, The Pool House’s lagoon-style property is non-stop fun. Inside, you’ll find an open-concept contemporary layout with a spacious kitchen that is the perfect place to hang out before you head out for the night. Rather stay in? Throw the big game on the widescreen, grab a beer from the wet bar, and pull up a seat at the poker table in the games room. If you need a break from the action, find yourself a shady spot under a palm tree to catch up on some reading or take a nap in the hammock. Grab your camera, hiking boots, and a picnic lunch to enjoy atop one of the lookouts in McDowell Sonoran Preserve, with over 100-miles of rugged desert landscape to explore. After, head to Kierland Commons, Scottsdale’s coolest new entertainment district, for some shopping and lunch at one of their many restaurants and bars. In the evening, check out the pubs in Old Town, or drive 20-minutes to the bustling downtown of Phoenix. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Start a new tradition with family or friends at Buckhorn Townhome 53. With ski-in access and beautiful views of the Colorado landscape, this Vail Valley vacation rental is one you’ll want to return to year after year. Its three bedrooms and professionally designed interiors can welcome groups of up to eight for a holiday in style in Bachelor Gulch.Guests of the townhome are welcome to use the shared pool and hot tubs at the nearby Ritz-Carlton Bachelor Gulch. The villa also has its own private barbecue area, plus an entertainment area with a TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi. A gas fireplace keeps it cozy, and laundry facilities make it convenient.Interiors by Ginger Barber Designs use a neutral palette and one-of-a-kind finds for a sophisticated and eclectic feel. The central open-concept great room features two sitting areas—one around the fireplace and one around the TV—along with a dining area for six and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.This luxury property has two bedrooms with king beds, including a master with a honeymoon-suite-worthy jetted tub and walk-in closet, and one bedroom with two twin bunk beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and the same considered style as the great room: soft-toned bedding set off by antique pieces such as accent chairs and writing desks.Buckhorn Townhome 53 enjoys ski-in access from the Ridge Rider run, and guests can walk or glide to the Roughlock run for ski-out access. For après-ski dining or shopping, make the 8-minute drive to the town of Avon or the 4-mile drive to Beaver Creek Village. If you’ll be staying during the summer, it’s also a short drive to the Beaver Creek Golf Club. And if you don’t feel like driving yourself, ask about the on-call shuttle service included in your stay at the townhome.Business License Number: 003670Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Get close to the action at Utah’s top ski-town with this central, convenient and highly sought-after apartment. This fully-outfitted modern property offers sporty flair and lots of cosy extras, like the glowing fireplace and rooftop terrace. The grand living room offers a great view of downtown Park City, being just seconds from the slopes and the city’s buzzing bar, brewpub and restaurant scene.Enter Azure Vista via one of Park City’s vibrant central streets, which is decked out in ski regalia and sporting imagery. Guests can congregate in the comfortably outfitted central living area, with the city views and entertainment system providing plenty of stimulation, all within steps of the lengthy dining table and fully-equipped kitchen. After a hearty breakfast, guests can take in the bracing mountain air with a coffee or juice on the rooftop terrace, which provides a fine view of the slopes and hills that surround this charming mountain town. Guests can chase away the chills with a dip in the rooftop tub, or by luxuriating in front of the gas-fed fireplace, which bathes the apartment’s central room in a golden glow.With downtown as your local neighborhood, guests can truly get the best out of their stay in the Wasatch Back. A short walk is all it takes to access the 17 slopes of the dynamic Park City ski resort, while the similarly impressive Deer Valley resort is just a few minutes by car. Guests also have fantastic access to the historic district of downtown and can stroll and explore at will when annual events such as the Sundance Film Festival come to down. Despite being situated in the natural splendor of the Rocky Mountains, guests can make outings to the metropolis that is Salt Lake City in approximately 30 minutes, while drives across the landscape to the Provo River and the majestic national forest beyond is always an option for the adventurous at heart. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This gorgeous Bel Air villa offers exquisite privacy and rustic enchantment just minutes from some of the finest attractions in Los Angeles. Beautiful alfresco living areas invite you to lounge and dine in the Southern California sun, while the gorgeous interior melds rural charm with modern amenities to create an ideal ambiance for family and friends. Seven bedrooms accommodate family reunions, destination wedding guests, or unforgettable gatherings with friends.The ample yard and terrace evoke the Hamptons at summertime. Walk across the lush lawn and plunge into the sparkling swimming pool. Luxuriate on stylish loungers and sway on the charming tree swing. Return to the beautiful brick patio for an afternoon barbeque and alfresco meal, and sip a fine wine in the lounge with sweeping views of the Brentwood hills.Lovely doors open from the terrace to the open-plan kitchen and dining area, inviting an exquisite alfresco ambiance inside. Cook delicious meals in the rustic kitchen with high-end appliances, and relish them at the wooden farmhouse table. At night, sip digestifs by the fire, watch a favorite film in the media room, and play a game of pool in the parlor with vaulted wood ceilings. If you need a quiet niche for work or study, the lovely office suite is ideal.The villa's main house features six bedrooms: four with king beds, one with a queen, and one with two twins. Five of these six bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms. The master suite includes a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. There is also a guesthouse with queen bedroom, kitchenette, ensuite bathroom, and doors to the terrace.Bel Air & Beyond offers an outstanding balance of privacy and convenience, with the Getty Center just two-and-a-half miles from your door and myriad other worldclass attractions—including Santa Monica Beach and Pier, Venic Beach, Universal Studios, and Griffith Observatory—within eight to twelve miles.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Registration number: HSR19-002462

listing.listing_description: With a sprawling backyard, mountain views and a location close to some of the area’s best golf courses, Strut Oasis - 70 truly lives up to its name. This Desert Cities retreat has incredible amenities and stylish open-plan interiors, making it perfect for a warm-weather holiday with family or golf getaway with friends. Reserve this six-bedroom vacation rental for groups of up to a dozen, or book its sister property, Strut Oasis - 71, for larger parties.Whether you prefer the California sunshine or the cool of the shade, the villa’s expansive outdoor living areas can accommodate. Stretch out on one of the loungers or hammocks by the pool and hot tub, challenge friends to a game of croquet on the lawn or practice your spike on the sand volleyball court. For those who picked shade, there are covered sitting and dining areas. As night falls, heat up the barbecue in the outdoor kitchen, gather around the firepit or head inside to enjoy the sound system, satellite TV and Wi-Fi.The interiors mix modern and traditional pieces with ease for a look of eclectic luxury. In the sitting area, mod lounge chairs square off against tufted leather sofas, while the dining area seats twelve in quilted leather chairs. An open-concept great room that includes the sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen encourages guests to mingle.Strut Oasis - 70 has three bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a honeymoon-suite-style master with a jetted tub, fireplace and terrace access, and one bedroom with its own private entrance. There’s also a king bedroom with a hall bathroom and a pair of bedrooms with king and queen beds, respectively, that share a bathroom. If you’re traveling with kids, they’ll love having their own space: a private room with two bunk beds.The villa is convenient for avid golfers, festival devotees, tennis buffs and shopping fiends alike; there are five golf clubs within a 10-mile drive, the Coachella grounds are 10 minutes away, and Indian Wells and Old Town La Quinta are both nearby. For more shopping and dining options, make the 5-minute drive into downtown Indio. Architecture fans will want to make a day trip to take in the mid-century style of Palm Springs; for equally incredible natural landscapes, head for Joshua Tree National Park.City ID # 19-00023265Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Backyard barbeques, midnight swims, and long soaks in the hot tub are on the menu at this secluded contemporary home in Huntington Beach. Flow through the massive wall-length opening to the private backyard and watch as guests mingle without barriers, utilizing the entire villa. When it gets late, take the party to one of the many nightclubs lining Huntington State Beach, just a few minutes away.Open-concept/open-air design is a huge point of pride for Pine Street. Make yourself a snack in the kitchen while the group’s mixologist sorts drink at the wet bar, and the kids splash around in the pool, all in direct sightlines of each other. Elements like the marble fireplace, designer furnishings, and accent walls are used to break-up the spaces without hindering the social flow.On a quiet night in, the widescreen and plush sofas in the living room are ready to host a family movie night, and the balcony in the master is a great spot to catch up on some reading. On not-so-quiet evenings, gather the gang around the fire pit and reminisce about old times or turn on the outdoor TV and watch the big game while you enjoy the weather of the west coast.Kick off your shoes and hit the shores of Huntington Beach, where you’ll find over 42-miles of sandy coast to explore. If you head south, Newport Beach and Balboa Pier are perfect for a date night. After a romantic dinner, take a ride on the Ferris wheel, spend some change in the arcade, and be a kid again, but without the kids. The next day, take the family to Disneyland or Califonia Adventure.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Entertain and relax with family and friends to your heart’s content at The Wildwood. This incredible South Lake Tahoe estate boasts 6,200 square feet of living space, seven bedrooms and amenities that make it feel like your own private mountain resort. And with a location less than 10 minutes from the beach and skiing at Heavenly, you’re close to activities no matter when you take your holiday.Enjoy the California summer from outdoor living spaces with a furnished deck, heat lamps and a hot tub. If there’s snow on the ground, you’ll find plenty to do indoors thanks to a games room with pool, ping-pong and foosball tables and a wet bar; an indoor pool; a sauna; a cable TV and Wi-Fi. There’s even an 18-seat home theater.The villa’s huge open-concept living spaces let you savor the luxury of spending time together. Cozy up to a gas fireplace, seat sixteen around the dining table or have a snack at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen—all in the open-plan great room. Details like oversized picture windows, polished wood paneling and a stone fireplace surround give the house a rustic charm.The Wildwood has two honeymoon-worthy bedrooms with king beds, gas fireplaces and en-suite bathrooms with jetted tubs, and one bedroom with two double beds and an en-suite bathroom. There is also one bedroom with one double bed, one with a double bed plus twin bed, and two bedrooms with two double beds each; these four share two Jack-and-Jill-style bathrooms.Not only is this vacation rental superbly appointed, it’s also conveniently located. It’s less than a 10-minute drive from Lakeside Beach, the ski area at Heavenly Mountain Resort, the Edgewood Tahoe Golf Course and the towns of Stateline and South Lake Tahoe.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.PERMIT #5907

listing.listing_description: This listing represents two identical and adjacent homes. Please talk to a Villa Specialist about availability for either home.The City of Palm Springs ID # 2817 & 2895The Palms at Park Villa is an exquisite, newly built luxury villa in heart of historic Palm Springs. Situated within minutes of downtown and numerous golf courses, and an easy drive from the Coachella Festival Grounds, the villa offers spectacular alfresco amenities, exquisitely designed interiors, and five fabulous bedrooms sleeping ten guests. Over 10,000 square feet of luxurious spaces creates an enchanting environment for family reunions, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests seeking refinement and comfort in this Southern California oasis.Surrounded by lush gardens and palms, and enjoying lovely views of the surrounding Sonoran Desert hills, the villa's outdoor terrace is perfect for savoring the region's exquisite light and air. Enjoy mornings floating in the swimming pool and relaxing on semi-submerged loungers and armchairs. Cook a barbeque lunch and relish it alfresco at the poolside table. On cool desert nights, sip champagne in the hot tub or cuddle up around the fire pit under the stars. Lovely lighting casts a dreamy glow on nighttime gatherings after a wonderful concert or evening on the town.Ample sliding glass doors open from the pool terrace to the interior kitchen and dining area, creating an expansive space for dinner and cocktail parties. Enjoy a delicious bottle of wine in the fabulous living room with fireplace, large TV, and lovely furnishings. Prepare dinner in the fully equipped kitchen with twin island breakfast bars, and gather around the beautiful dining table.The villa features five bedrooms: a master with king bed and four guest suites with queen beds. All of the rooms have deluxe ensuite bathrooms and open directly to the terrace or the furnished patio. The superb master suite is the most spacious of them all, and has a stand-alone tub in its bathroom.The Palms at Park Villa provides lovely balance of privacy and convenience in one of the finest neighborhoods in Palm Springs. You're just five minutes from the world-class art, cultural attractions, dining of the city's downtown area, while Golfers are within minutes of Mesquite, Indian Canyons, and Escena. Indio and the Coachella Festival Grounds are about twenty-three miles away. The villa includes a private garage as well as an electric vehicle charging station.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Two Trails is a wonderful Rocky Mountain chalet in Mountain Village, with ski-in/ski-out access to Upper Sundance Trail at Telluride Ski Resort. The capacious, 6,000-square-foot home is superbly appointed for a contemporary ski vacation, featuring an outdoor hot tub, a sauna, a spacious party room with billiard table, and a cavernous great room with gourmet kitchen and spectacular mountain views. Six superb bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms—including two deluxe king suites and two kid-friendly bunkrooms—offer ideal accommodations for families with children and groups of friends up to fourteen in size.The home stands majestically amid the pine forests of this serene enclave, enjoying breathtaking views of the San Sophia Mountains and Telluride slopes. The lodge-style great room features a towering stone hearth and gas fireplace, vaulted ceilings with exposed wood beams, reclaimed chestnut floors, and a pop-up TV within a lovely cabinet. The open kitchen boasts chef-grade appliances and expansive granite surfaces, and serves an exquisite timber dining table within a luminous, mountain-view niche. Multiple balconies extend from the villa's living areas and bedrooms, beckoning you into the delicious alpine air.The fabulous downstairs party room includes a billiard table, wet bar, and cozy TV den with fireplace. It opens directly to the hot tub on the deck—perfect for an end-of-day soak. The villa also features central heating, LiteTouch lighting, and a multi-room Sonos sound system.There are two deluxe king suites among the chalet's six bedrooms, making it an ideal choice for two families. Each features a fireplace, private balcony, and ensuite bathroom with shower and tub. The four remaining guestrooms include two charming kids' bunkrooms, and all feature ensuite bathrooms. The villa's sauna and steam shower are located in the bathroom adjoining one of the bunkrooms on the lower level, near the ski room.From the entrance to the ski room, you're just a few steps from Upper Sundance—your gateway to one of the finest ski resorts in the American West. The villa is also just seven miles from the vintage charm and bustling cultural scene of downtown Telluride, as well as Telluride Golf Course. Drive about twelve miles to the beautiful Alta Lake and its famed ghost town.TMVBL 006884Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Business license ID: 006164

listing.listing_description: European charm is in the details at this slopeside retreat at The Ritz-Carlton Club nestled in the shadow of Vail Mountain. You’ll see it in the village views, the turned-wood accents, and an exterior as bright yellow as a German palace—and feel it in the five-star service at the Ritz. It’s a 1-minute walk to the ski slopes and an even quicker ride on the complimentary shuttle.After the day’s last run, follow the steam to the heated outdoor pool and hot tub at the Ritz, which villa guests are welcome to use. If it’s still sunny out, have the first après-ski drink on the furnished private terrace; if not, cozy up to the indoor fireplace instead.Though the villa is laid out around a simple open-concept great room, luxe details elevate the space. Sink into the leather sofa or one of the armchairs in front of the fireplace, recount the day’s best runs at the welcoming round dining table for 6, or have an after-dinner coffee at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.If you’re chasing powder, board the complimentary shuttle to the slopes or make the 5-minute drive yourself to Eagle Bahn Gondola 19 at Vail Ski Resort. Beaver Creek Resort is also just 12 miles away if you’re looking for variety. For shops, restaurants, or a night out, it’s a 4-minute drive into Lionshead Village and a 2-minute drive into Vail Village.Business License: STL001956Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Looking for a secluded escape within minutes of the world-famous attractions in one of the most popular and visited cities in America? No problem. From its hillside perch, Beverly Grove enjoys scenic city views, easy access to the wonders of Los Angeles, as well as a private location. This Beverly Hills three-bedroom is the perfect family getaway, couples retreat, or honeymoon destination.Beverly Grove is a recently rebuilt smart home, outfitted with state of the art technology and top of the line designer furnishings. The white color scheme, complete with French white oak flooring, displays the iconic class and elegance of the architectural style with which Beverly Hills has become synonymous. The open concept floor plan, high ceilings, and floor-to-ceiling windows make Beverly Grove feel even more spacious, especially when the doors to the balcony are slid open, inviting fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight. Although the villa can seem quite formal at times, its also possesses a calming quality that will surely melt all your stress away. And, if you’d like an even more relaxing space, head down the wooden staircase that leads to the teahouse and koi pond.If you’re thinking of hosting an elegant dinner soiree, Beverly Grove is the ideal co-host, with its fully equipped kitchen, formal dining area, wet bar, barbecue, and espresso machine, you’ll have everything you need. The fireplace and sound system provide classic atmosphere inside, while the swimming pool, hot tub, and outdoor lounge are perfect for a little after dinner fun on the terrace. And, Beverly Grove comes with an elevator and parking garage.Within ten miles of your luxurious hillside home, you’ll find downtown Hollywood, Rodeo Drive, Universal Studios, the Sunset Strip, and so much more. If you’re in the mood for a day on the beach, Santa Monica Pier, Venice Beach, and Malibu Pier are all just a short drive from home. And, if you’d like to explore one of California’s most breathtaking natural environments, Topanga State Park is just thirteen miles from Beverly Grove.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: See the villa’s namesake—and a whole panorama of forest, valley and peaks—at Four Pines 12. Set within the exclusive Shooting Star community in Teton Village, this luxury Wyoming vacation rental has both expansive views and a location close to the best of the area’s activities. Its stylish, spacious interiors and five bedrooms let you invite up to ten friends and family on a Jackson Hole getaway.Laze away sunny days on a terrace with loungers and an al-fresco dining area, or soak away après-ski aches in the private outdoor hot tub. Inside the house, the amenities range from a TV, Wi-Fi and wood-burning fireplace to laundry facilities and an office space.Stone walls and exposed wooden beams give the living room of Four Pines 12 the cozy charm of a mountain cabin, but the open-concept layout is decidedly modern. Stretch out on comfortable sofas around the fireplace and TV, gather everyone around a farmhouse-style dining table or whip up feasts and snacks with equal ease in a fully equipped kitchen with granite countertops and gourmet appliances.The villa has four bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with a gas fireplace, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All five bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms, giving you the comforts of a hotel while on holiday.From Four Pines 12, it’s just a 3-minute walk to the Shooting Star Golf Course and a 3-minute drive to shopping and dining in Teton Village and skiing at Jackson Hole Mountain Resort—and just steps to a nearby bike path. For everything from boutiques and galleries featuring unique souvenirs and original artwork to restaurants serving up honeymoon-worthy fare, make the short drive into the town of Jackson.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stay close to the Coachella grounds, several golf courses and downtown Indio at Strut Oasis - 71. With an expansive backyard and well-appointed outdoor living areas, this Desert Cities vacation rental lives up to the “oasis” in its name. Book this five-bedroom property for a holiday with up to twelve friends and family members; for larger parties, reserve its sister property, Strut Oasis - 70, as well.Soak in the California sunshine from a lounger or hammock by the pool, play a game of croquet or practice cartwheels on the lawn, and serve up meals fresh from the barbecue at the al-fresco dining area. Of course, it’s just as easy to entertain or relax indoors, where you’ll find a pool table, Sonos sound system, satellite TV, Wi-Fi and a wine cooler.The interiors of Strut Oasis - 71 are comfortable and modern—but with a glamorous edge that’s a reminder of the mid-century days when the Desert Cities were both honeymoon destination and hideaway for Hollywood celebrities. The open-plan great room, with sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen, offers the luxury of plenty of space for everyone to gather. Pieces like tufted royal-blue sofas, brass stools at the breakfast bar and Eames molded dining armchairs add individual chic to each space within the room.The villa’s master suite is its own private oasis with a king bed, en-suite bathroom with jetted tub and walk-in closet. There are three other bedrooms with king beds—one with a hall bathroom, and two that share a hall bathroom—and one bedroom with two bunk beds and an en-suite bathroom. For larger parties, there are three other rooms with two queen beds and a king bed.With several golf clubs, the Coachella festival grounds, downtown Indio and Old Town La Quinta all within a 10-minute drive, you can easily spend a day teeing off, watching a world-class performer, exploring shops and restaurants, or browsing boutiques in a charming ambience. Architecture buffs won’t want to miss the mid-century modern masterpieces in nearby Palm Springs, while fans of more natural works of art will want to hike through the unforgettable scenery in Joshua Tree National Park.City ID # 20-00023266Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Stay in the shadow of Lone Mountain—and within steps of the ski slopes—at Swift Bear Lodge. This contemporary Big Sky vacation rental offers year-round access to the best of Montana’s outdoor adventures. Luxury amenities will help you relax after a day outside, and five bedrooms can comfortably accommodate a group of fifteen friends or extended family.Swift Bear Lodge features outdoor living areas with a barbecue and a private hot tub, for summer guests or visitors wanting a soak after a day of skiing. Inside, the villa has a wood-burning fireplace, pool table, TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi. Boot dryers, ski storage and laundry facilities mean your gear will always be ready for the next day’s activities.The lodge is laid out around an open-concept great room with a sitting area, dining table for ten and a fully equipped kitchen. The space is flooded with sunlight and mountain views thanks to oversized windows, and gets a cozy vibe from exposed wood beams. You’ll find a TV and the pool table in a separate games room on the lower level.The villa has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a jetted tub. One bedroom with a king bed and one bedroom with a twin-over-double bunk bed share a bathroom. The fifth bedroom has two twin-over-double bunk beds, a queen sleeper sofa and an en-suite bathroom.If you’ve come out west for a ski holiday, the lodge’s Mountain Village location delivers. You’ll enjoy ski-in, ski-out access to the White Otter lift, and can reach the Big Sky Resort base in just 5 minutes by car. In warmer weather, play a round at Big Sky Golf Course or make the easy hike to the stunning Ousel Falls.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Experience true Western hospitality at Golf and Tennis 15. Whether you’re eager to tee off or practice your serve or would prefer to stay in and just admire the Wyoming scenery, you’ll find something to love about this charming cabin-style vacation rental near the town of Jackson. Enjoy its picturesque setting, cozy architecture and three bedrooms with family and friends, or reserve it for a honeymoon close to nature.In warmer weather, watch the moon rise over the mountains from outdoor areas with a barbecue and firepit. If you’ve come for the skiing, leave gear in the mudroom and unwind by the wood-burning fireplace with the help of the TV and Wi-Fi.Though it does use plenty of wood and stone for a warm, inviting feel, this cabin-inspired residence is surprisingly modern inside, with floor-to-ceiling windows showcasing views of the Grand Tetons and graceful furnishings filling the sitting and dining areas. An equally wonderful surprise is the fully equipped kitchen and its breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances and granite countertops.Golf and Tennis 15 has one master bedroom with a king bed and a private en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms with queen beds and shared access to a hall bathroom, one of which also has a queen sofa bed. The three bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to ten on holiday together.In addition to comfortable surroundings, a stay at the villa also affords guests the luxury of being close to the best of the outdoor attractions in the area. It’s a 5-minute walk from Golf and Tennis 15 to the Jackson Hole Golf and Tennis Club, less than a 5-mile drive to Grand Teton National Park and less than a 10-mile drive to the shopping, dining and nightlife in the town of Jackson. And in the winter, it’s just under 18 miles to skiing at the Jackson Hole Mountain Resort.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Steal away to a unique private sanctuary in a coveted location at Flat Iron Retreat. This gorgeous contemporary home has one-of-a-kind luxury amenities, more than 6,000 square feet of living space that can accommodate up to ten friends or family members. Plus, its setting in The Colony at Park City puts you in an exclusive location close to the Flat Iron ski lift at Park City Mountain Resort.The estate impresses both outside and in with a furnished deck featuring a barbecue, firepit and hot tub. Inside, let the glass elevator whisk you between the great room and a lower-level entertaining area, where you’ll find a lounge with a bar and pool table, an inviting home theater and an indoor sports court that can be used for basketball, racquetball and “wallyball” (a fast-paced game similar to volleyball that will quickly become part of your happy holiday memories).Sleek contemporary interiors also set this vacation rental apart. A wall of windows, sloped ceiling and open-concept layout lend the upper-level great room a bright, welcoming feel. The furnishings make it easy to relax: cozy up to the stone fireplace in a trendy ikat-print chair, sip a drink on one of the barstools facing the fireplace and TV, or relive the day’s adventures around the dining table. Custom cabinets, marble counters and state-of-the-art appliances mean the fully equipped kitchen is both stylish and functional.Flat Iron Retreat has two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed, walk-in closet and mountain views, and a kids’ room with three queen bunk beds and its own lounge area. A guest room has a queen Murphy bed and access to a bathroom off the home theatre.If the amenities weren’t enough, ski-in, ski-out access to the Flat Iron ski run for intermediate and advanced skiers makes the honeymoon from real life complete. It’s also a short drive to the Canyons lifts, the Park City Mountain Resort base and historic Main Street in downtown Park City. Be sure to take a day trip to Utah Olympic Park, where you can tour the facilities and even try a bobsled run yourself.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Step under the rich wooden eaves of this mountain mansion to begin your fairytale vacation in the Rockies. The galleried central living area makes an instant impression, with the warmth and stone authority of the huge fireplace offering a welcome return after a day spent skiing or snowboarding. With sweeping views from the bedroom and study windows, guests are minutes from happening Breckenridge.The sheer grandeur of Windwood Estate is evident as soon as guests arrive via the spacious driveway, with the robust, wooden exteriors harking back to the 19th century origins of this community. Inside, guests can take in the striking, hardwood furnishings that add to every spacious room, while special touches like the magnificent antler chandelier references the wild fauna of Colorado that roam nearby. The enveloping, luxurious bathrooms will be particularly appealing to guests who are looking to relax after a day experiencing what the nearby Breckenridge resort has to offer.While the interior delights of Windwood Estate are attractive, guests will of course be attracted to the natural scenes and winter sports of the nearby hillsides. Just a couple of minutes drive away, the local gondola will deposit fun-loving guests onto the high-altitude of Peak 8, which features some of the best-loved runs in the Rockies. Guests are also just a few minutes from excellent golfing, all the nightlife and culinary options of the town itself, plus hiking, mountain biking and fishing in the valley at large.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
