listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist. Set on a wild Colorado hillside, this villa sets guests amongst the dynamic splendor of this mountain state. With comfortable interiors, sunlit kitchen and restful living room, guests can take in a peerless view of the surrounding valley from the upper deck. Offering easy access to the Wildhorse Gondola and the local ski slopes, while the welcoming town of Steamboat Springs is just minutes away.The Rocky Mountains are in full view at all times at this mountain getaway, with the peaks of Buffalo Mountain and Copper Ridge catching the morning sunrise in a blaze of glory. Linger over a reviving breakfast at the modern and fully-equipped kitchen before taking the air on the upper level terrace, where bracing Colorado air will fill your lungs with the possibility of adventure. The finely outfitted living room, complete with entertainment system and a nice touch of Western style makes the perfect spot for relaxing after a day spent speeding down the slopes or simply exploring nearby mountain towns. Watch the sun sink into a brilliant red sunset on the comfortably outfitted deck with a cold drink in hand, as the villa’s barbecue softly grills a delicious supper.Steamboat Springs is particularly renowned for its skiing, with the impressive heights of the nearby slopes on Mount Werner dominating the valley. Guests at Flat Tops can make the most of swift access, sweeping up the valley via a private gondola to speed across fresh powder during refreshing morning outings. Beyond skiing, guests can make the most of what the mountains have to offer, from snowmachine tours in the winter to energetic hikes and nature-trail outings in the warmer months. Steamboat Springs, right on the villa’s doorstep, offers a broad range of bars and riverside restaurants to choose from - ideal for rest and good times after a day spent in the great outdoors.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the “City of Festivals” Indio, this serene five-bedroom offers the seclusion of the Montage gated community, while you spend your vacation exploring the vibrant desert cities of California. Whether you’re in town for a festival, golf trip with friends, or a family vacation, Villa Serenity is the paradise you’ve been searching for. With an incredible back patio, spacious group-friendly interiors, and elegant spaces for formal occasions, Serenity is ready for anything you can dream up for your next Luxury Retreat.Serenity’s back patio is a tropical oasis. Gorgeous natural stonework, mature palm trees, lush greenery, and bright decor make this desert home feel like it’s hidden deep in the jungle. The saltwater swimming pool and gas fire pit further enhance the wild feel of this secluded paradise. Inside, Serenity switches gears a little and moves in an elegant Spanish colonial direction with its relaxing cream tones, designer furniture, and dark stained wood beams and cabinetry. The living room brings back the intricate stonework of the patio in its beautiful accent wall, containing the fireplace and wide screen television. In the kitchen, there’s plenty of functional working space, granite countertops, and state of the art appliances. And, just off the kitchen, a chic dining room awaits, with seating for eight.Designed to entertain, Serenity has something fun for everyone, like a billiards table, hot tub, barbecue, and even a putting green. Inside, you’ll have cable television, Wi-Fi, stereo, air conditioning, and washer/dryer. And, three of Serenity’s bedrooms feature king sized beds and en-suite bathrooms, while the others are great for sharing to accommodate up to fourteen people.Within ten miles of Serenity, you’ll find numerous golf courses, the closest being the country clubs of Indian Palms and Motorcoach, both are just a five-minute drive. If you’re in town for the festivals, the Coachella Festival Grounds and downtown Indio are just five minutes away. And, travel a little further, and you can visit Joshua Tree National Park, one of California’s most celebrated natural landscapes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.License Number: 20-00019905

listing.listing_description: No matter what season you visit Sun Valley, there’s always lots of fun and excitement to be had. From the ski slopes to the golf course, this private, five-bedroom vacation home is always ready for an adventure. And, with its central location, you’re never more than a few miles from Sun Valley’s main attractions. There’s plenty of space and sleeping accommodations for ten, making Skyline perfect for a family holiday, a ski or golf trip with friends, or an unforgettable corporate retreat.Spectacular Mountain views are framed by Skyline’s massive windows, following the contours of the vaulted ceiling, the interior is spacious and one with its natural surroundings. Exposed wood, intricate stonework, and leather couches set a rustic-chic tone throughout. The warmth created in Skyline is both cozy and elegant, perfect for a relaxing night in or a formal dinner party. In the kitchen, beautiful stained-wood cabinetry is punctuated by rich granite countertops. High-end stainless steel appliances will inspire your inner chef. And, the formal dining table is made of authentic raw-wood, with eight chairs to match.After dinner, head to the lounge, it’s a great spot for a relaxing night with family and friends. There’s a pool table, arcade games, bubble hockey, and an amazing view of the hillside. Cozy up on the plush leather couch and warm yourself by the wood burning fireplace. You could also get a fire going outside, roast some marshmallows, turn on the heat lamps, and enjoy a starry night from the furnished terrace.If it's golf or skiing you’re after, you’re in luck. Two beautifully scenic courses and two easily accessible chairlifts are located within three miles of Skyline. If you feel like exploring the city, visit downtown Ketchum and check out some of their boutique shops, local restaurants, and vibrant nightlife. You could also spend the night ice skating at the town rink or catch the latest movie at the Magic Lantern Cinema.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stay within a 10-minute drive of golf, polo and the Coachella festival grounds at Polo Villas - 4 Bedroom. Not only is this Desert Cities vacation rental in an ideal location, its half-acre lot and 4,000 square feet of indoor space are perfect for entertaining and relaxing. Invite up to ten guests for a getaway with friends, small family reunion, business retreat or even a quiet California destination wedding.This luxury property is laid out around a sunny terrace with a pool, hot tub, barbecue, row of loungers, and sitting and dining areas. Borrow the provided bicycles to explore the neighborhood (or even ride to the polo grounds), then return to stretch out in front of the Apple TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.Inside the Polo Villas - 4 Bedroom, the L-shaped great room features sitting and dining areas that open to the pool terrace via wide sliding glass doors. A fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar links the two areas, and throughout the space, neutral tones and sleek furnishings are set off by colorful artwork and vibrant throw pillows.The villa has two master bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, and two bedrooms with queen beds that share a Jack-and-Jill bathroom. Larger parties can make use of an extra bedroom with two twin beds and access to a hall bathroom if desired.Whether you’re escaping to the area on honeymoon like the Hollywood stars of yore or simply seeking a holiday in the sunshine, there’s plenty to do around Polo Villas. It’s a 5-minute walk from the property to the Coachella festival grounds, and less than a 10-minute drive to four golf courses, downtown Indio and shopping in Old Town La Quinta. For a look at the region’s stunning natural scenery, take a day trip to Joshua Tree National Park or ride the Palm Springs Aerial Tramway; for a look at its manmade surroundings, check out the mid-century architecture in downtown Palm Springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Permit number: 111003

listing.listing_description: Rustic charm pairs with a great Steamboat Springs location at Brown Bear Chalet. Fitted with wood trim and natural stone, and set beside a national forest where you just might see its namesake, this luxury vacation rental is a short walk from the nearest ski lift and a short drive from downtown, golf and more. Bring family for a winter getaway or memorable reunion, or friends for a cozy ski holiday in Colorado’s so-called Ski Town USA.Your stay in the Bear Chalets community includes private shuttle service to the nearest chairlift. At the end of a day on the slopes, leave your gear in the storage cupboards, hang your boots on the dryers and let the villa’s elevator whisk you upstairs or down. Enjoy a favorite movie on the flat-screen television with surround sound, test your skill around the pool table or challenge the kids on the video game system. The villa also opens to its own deck and terrace with a barbecue, dining table and hot tub, for cookouts on sunny days and soaks on winter nights.Brown Bear Chalet is laid out around a spacious open-plan great room, where soaring ceilings, exposed wooden beams, a stone fireplace and a hunting trophy lend a classic mountain-lodge feel. Buttery leather sofas and chairs and a dining table with seating for ten are both stylish and comfortable. In the adjacent fully equipped kitchen, gourmet appliances, alder cabinets, granite counters and a breakfast bar will inspire cooks and diners alike.Each of the chalet’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom, for hotel-worthy accommodations in a private setting. There are three bedrooms with king beds and one with two bunk beds that’s ideal for children.During your time at Brown Bear, you’ll have the choice of walking to the Thunderhead lift, taking the shuttle or making the 5-minute drive yourself to Steamboat Ski Resort. In the summer, it’s also a quick drive to the fast greens and challenging holes of Rollingstone Ranch Golf Club. Be sure to spend an afternoon playing in the pools at Steamboat Springs Old Town or an evening reliving your honeymoon with some stargazing from the hot springs at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Surround yourself with urban sophistication in the heart of historic Park City at Parkite on Main Two Two. Set in a new luxury development on Main Street, this Utah vacation rental is a contemporary retreat that’s just steps from shopping, dining and the nearest ski lift. Reserve its two bedrooms for a couples getaway, a ski holiday as a family or a mountain honeymoon.The villa opens to a furnished private terrace with a barbecue and hot tub, where you can prep dinner while watching the bustling town below or soak away a day on the slopes. Inside, you’ll find Apple and cable TV, an integrated sound system, Wi-Fi and, for when you just need to relax, a wine fridge and gas fireplace.Lit by a wall of glass leading to the terrace, the villa’s open-concept great room is bright and airy. Its living and dining areas show mid-century influence in a tufted sofa and pedestal dining table, and the fully equipped kitchen is sleek and modern. The villa also has a separate media room and a spare room where you can steal a quiet moment with a book.Both bedrooms at Parkite on Main Two Two have king beds and en-suite bathrooms. For larger parties, there’s also a Murphy bed in the media room and a day bed in the spare room, which has access to a hallway bathroom.It’s easy to access the shops and restaurants along Park City’s historic Main Street from the villa—just go downstairs and start strolling. Parkite on Main is also less than a 10-minute walk from local favorite Park Silly Sunday Market and the Town chairlift at Park City Mountain Resort. You’ll find two other ski areas and a golf course within a 10-minute drive.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The gondola glides by overhead and the pool stretches out below Morningside Ridge 608. This stunning slopeside vacation rental is part of the Edgemont community in Steamboat Springs, giving you access to the Stampede ski run and exclusive amenities. Invite up to six friends or family members to join you for a relaxed ski holiday or an outdoor adventure in the postcard-worthy Colorado scenery.Your stay at Morningside Ridge 608 includes access to the shared ski storage, boot dryers, heated outdoor pool and hot tub, as well as the seasonal shuttle. Two private balconies give you panoramic views from the Flat Tops to Sand Mountain, and there’s a barbecue for warmer nights. On snowy evenings, pour a glass from the wine cooler and cozy up to the fireplace to enjoy a favorite show on the flat-screen television or share photos of the day’s best runs via Wi-Fi.A generous open-plan layout makes the villa ideal for groups, and the furnishings balance rustic inspiration with modern comfort. Read, nap or watch television on the sofas while the fireplace crackles softly in the background, or sit down to a hearty après-ski meal in the jaunty striped chairs around the dining table. Sleek stools at the breakfast bar and stainless steel appliances lend a bit of contemporary edge to the fully equipped kitchen.This luxury villa has a standout master bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, mountain views and a fireplace; it also opens to the balcony. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds and share a hallway bathroom. Wood trim, checked throws and details such as woven wall hangings or vintage doors lend warmth and personality to the bedrooms.Each morning, simply grab your gear and head down to the first floor of the Edgemont complex for ski-in, ski-out access to the Stampede run at Steamboat Ski Resort. The villa is also close to shopping, dining and nightlife in the mountain village. If the hills are more green than white, book a tee time at the nearby Rollingstone Ranch golf course or a kayaking or rafting expedition on the Yampa River. No matter what time of year, it’s well worth visiting the town’s hot springs; try lively Old Town for a family-friendly experience or romantic Strawberry Park for a honeymoon-worthy soak.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Rustic luxe interiors and a magnificent landscape make Monte Video an unforgettable retreat in the heart of the Rockies. Just a few miles from downtown Breckenridge, where you’ll find skiing, sledding and shopping, the villa boasts panoramic mountain views from nearly every room. Four bedrooms and extras like a billiards room and wine cellar make the property ideal for family getaways or ski trips with friends.If you’re visiting at the height of ski season, you’ll appreciate the villa’s heated parking, hot tub and gas fireplace. After a day of skiing or boarding, gather around a favorite movie in the media room, challenge friends and family at the billiards table or enjoy a tasting in the wine cellar. In the summer, prep dinner on the barbecue and spend the evening watching the stars come out from the al-fresco dining area and deck.Natural tones and textures make Monte Video feel like part of the Colorado landscape. Vaulted ceilings, exposed beams and a dramatic two-story stone fireplace are classic lodge features in the living room, while a cream-colored rug and sofa and leather club chairs invite guests to make themselves comfortable. Wood floors and thick beams give the dining room a more intimate feel, though its mountain views can only be described as expansive. The fully equipped kitchen is a dream for cooks and diners alike, with a large range and convenient breakfast bar.Two king bedrooms, two queen bedrooms—all with en-suite bathrooms—and a queen sofa bed can comfortably accommodate up to ten guests. The master suite, on the main floor, has a king bed, jetted tub and fireplace and opens to the deck. The second king bedroom is on the upper story. On the lower level, you’ll find the two queen bedrooms.From Monte Video’s beautiful setting, it’s just a short drive to the best of Breckenridge: 5 miles to the shops, restaurants and galleries of historic Main Street, 5.5 miles to the BreckConnect gondola, 6 miles to sledding and tubing at Carter Park and 6.5 miles to skating at Breckenridge Ice Arena. At the end of your stay, plan on a 107-mile drive from the villa to Denver International Airport.Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Near the heart of Pebble Beach, this villa is an impeccable choice for day trips and scenic drives around Monterey County. Within touching distance of legendary golf clubs like Pebble Beach and Cypress Point, the spacious villa delivers visual style, grandeur, sunlight-drenched lawns and peerless group dining. From here, plan coast drives, beach days, or dining excursions up and down the coast.Located over two levels, and backed by a natural landscape of California oaks and hardwoods, this modern and fully-outfitted villa has been designed with the discerning guest in mind. Making fine use of rich woods, rich golds and browns, guests can relax in total contentment on the sloped terrace, taking up a sun-recliner as the sea breeze comes in over Pebble Beach. The cathedral-like living space offers a pleasant sea-view, while the games room, charming bar and fully-outfitted kitchen makes the villa a fantastic home-away-from-home for an adult group looking to mix, socialize and just experience the best of what Pebble Beach has to offer.This part of Monterey County has a reputation second to none for natural beauty and outdoor pursuits. Take off on the 17 Mile Drive for one of the most scenic driving experiences in the country, leading to increasingly dramatic ocean views and clifftop vistas along the coastal highway to the south. Make the short trip to artistic hub of nearby Carmel, where charming cafes, restaurants and bars offer wonderful diversions, especially after a day relaxing on the beach or the top-rated fareways. After a day exploring the region, watch the sun go down over the Pacific from the terrace with a bottle of Californian red, as good conversation flows and the stars peep out over the nearby headlands.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Make one of Vail Valley's newest luxury vacation rentals your base for a ski break or even a honeymoon-style escape to the mountains at The Lion Vail - 1 Bedroom Residence. This beautifully appointed residence is both stylish and practical, and this exclusive community is just a 2-minute walk from Lionshead Village and two ski lifts.Guests of The Lion are welcome to use the community's shared indoor pool, indoor and outdoor hot tubs, gym, steam room, business center and children's room. After a day on the slopes, leave gear in the villa's private ski lockers and unwind by the TV, fireplace and Wi-Fi or watch the stars come out from the furnished balcony.The residence's open-concept great room, with its living area, dining table for five and fully equipped kitchen, is well equipped enough for a family. Mid-century-inspired details, like an elliptical coffee table and Wishbone-style dining chairs, lend a modern flair not often found in ski lodges, while in the kitchen, granite countertops and walnut cabinets make the space a pleasure to use.The villa's one bedroom, however, is just the right size for two. It has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and fireplace for a cozy ambience. Should alternate arrangements be required, there is a queen sleeper sofa in the living room and a full hallway bathroom.Start each morning of your holiday with the 2-minute walk to Lionshead Village (or the 7-minute shuttle ride there), the 3-minute walk to an express lift and gondola, or the 5-minute drive to the Vail Ski Resort base, and you'll quickly be on your way to some of the best skiing in Colorado. If you'll be visiting in warmer weather, it's still less than 10 minutes to both Vail Golf Club and the Betty Ford Alpine Gardens.Business License Number: 003670Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
